description_for_human:
This is a plugin that retrieves web pages for you,
but only web pages that have static html content available at initial render, so web sites like medium, wiki etc... should work...
Also it only returns first ~1300 chars from the page.
EXAMPLE USAGE: "Please summarize this web page for me: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lorem_ipsuma"
description_for_model: This is a plugin that retrieves web page content for you
